product_name: Spenco 2nd Skin Dressing Kit - Package of 8
long_description: The Spenco 2nd Skin(R) dressing kit helps you prevent and manage blisters while on the trail. Contains two 6.5 x 3 in. 2nd Skin moist pad sheets, five 3 x 1.5 in. adhesive knit strips and one 5 x 3 in. adhesive knit sheet. 2nd Skin moist pads are used to protect against pressure, friction and blistering; moist pads cool and soothe on contact and won't stick to skin. Adhesive knit sheets and strips help prevent blisters and hold the 2nd Skin moist pads in place. Spenco 2nd Skin dressing kit is suitable for areas other than your hands and feet.
short_description: The Spenco 2nd Skin(R) dressing kit helps you prevent and manage blisters while on the trail.
